wikipedia_page.main: Mark Campbell (born 4 February 1978) is a Scottish association footballer, who last played with Kilwinning Rangers.

response: It was announced on 25 June 2011, along with ex-Raith colleague Mark Campbell, that he had agreed terms but not yet signed for Dumfries club Queen of the South."2 more to sign" www.qosfc.com 25 Jun 2011 His Queens debut was on 23 July 2011 the extra time 2–0 defeat away at Ayr United in the 2011–12 Scottish Challenge Cup."Ayr United 2 – 0 Queen of the South" 23 Jul 2011 www.qosfc.com
*Mark Campbell (political consultant), former college administrator and former Republican political strategist
